Package fr.univartois.cril.approximation.util.collections.maps

Class ArrayBasedMapHelper<K>

java.lang.Object
fr.univartois.cril.approximation.util.collections.maps.ArrayBasedMapHelper<K>
Type Parameters:
K - The type of the keys in the map.
public final class ArrayBasedMapHelper<K> extends Object
The ArrayBasedMapHelper manages the keys of an array-based map without considering the values, so that this helper can be reused for any type, even primitive ones.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ArrayBasedMapHelper.EntryHelper
    The EntryHelper represents a mapping in this map.
    class 
    ArrayBasedMapHelper.IteratorHelper
    The IteratorHelper allows to iterate over the mappings of this map.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArrayBasedMapHelper

      public ArrayBasedMapHelper(Class<K> keyClass, ToIntFunction<K> keyToIndex, IntFunction<K> indexToKey, int capacity)
      Creates a new ArrayBasedMapHelper.
      Parameters:
      keyClass - The class of the keys.
      keyToIndex - The function used to compute the index associated to a key.
      indexToKey - The function used to retrieve the key at a given index.
      capacity - The capacity of the map.

  • Method Details

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of key-value mappings in the map.
      Returns:
      The number of key-value mappings in the map.

    • put

      public int put(K key)
      Puts a key into the map. Putting the value is left to the map implementation.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to put into the map.
      Returns:
      The index at which the key has been put.

    • containsKey

      public boolean containsKey(Object key)
      Returns true if the map contains a mapping for the specified key.
      Parameters:
      key - The key whose presence in the map is to be tested.
      Returns:
      true if the map contains a mapping for the specified key.

    • isUsed

      public boolean isUsed(int index)
      Checks whether the key at the given index is used.
      Parameters:
      index - The index to check.
      Returns:
      If the key with the given index is used.

      public int indexOf(Object key)
      Gives the index of a key in the map.

    • keyOf

      public K keyOf(int index)
      Gives the key at the given index in the map.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the key to give.
      Returns:
      The key at the given index, or null if the key is not present in the map.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the given index is out of the bounds of the underlying array.

    • remove

      public boolean remove(int index)
      Removes the key at the given index in the map. Removing the value is left to the map implementation.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the key to remove.
      Returns:
      If the key to remove was used.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the given index is out of the bounds of the underlying array.

    • remove

      public int remove(Object key)
      Removes the given key from the map. Removing the value is left to the map implementation.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to remove.
      Returns:
      The index of the removed key, or -1 if the key was not used.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Removes all of the keys from the map. Removing all the values is left to the map implementation.

    • keySet

      public Set<K> keySet()
      Gives a set view of the keys of the map.
      Returns:
      A set view of the keys of the map.

    • iteratorHelper

      public ArrayBasedMapHelper<K>.IteratorHelper iteratorHelper()
      Gives an iterator helper to help to iterate over the map.
      Returns:
      The helper for the iteration.

    • nextUsedKey

      public int nextUsedKey(int index)
      Gives the index of the next used key, starting from the given index (excluded).
      Parameters:
      index - The index to start from.
      Returns:
      The next index which is used, or -1 if there is not.
